comments: Students felt Prof. Kihlstrom’s lecture style was “dry” and “boring”, but not necessarily his fault. The TA’s slowness in grading and lack of coordination with the professor meant that students did not receive enough feedback on their work during the year, especially given the course’s emphasis on cases and quizzes.  For many students, this detracted from what would have otherwise been a satisfactory course.
